radiographic_examinations.findings: Focal area of dense calcification, less than 1 cm in diameter, in the region of the left hippocampus, adjacent to the choroid fissure.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in the calcific lesion in the left temporal lobe after one year.

radiographic_examinations.findings: High-density calcified focus in the medial portion of the left temporal lobe.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Remained unchanged from previous CT scan.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Focus of abnormal magnetic susceptibility in the medial portion of the left temporal lobe; mucosal thickening in the right sphenoid and ethmoid sinuses.
Reduced accumulation in the left temporal lobe; no evidence of abnormal uptake elsewhere in the brain.
